concept.title: Gridiron Gambit
concept.description: Experience the thrill of the game as you become the star running back, dodging, weaving, and breaking tackles to score the game-winning touchdown in this top-down 2D arcade football experience.
concept.theme: Classic arcade sports with a slightly stylized, energetic feel. Think vibrant colors and dynamic animations.
concept.objective: Score a touchdown by carrying the football across the opponent's goal line. Progress through increasingly difficult defenses and challenging scenarios.
mechanics: Ball Carrier Movement: Responsive directional movement and acceleration control the player's speed and agility.
Tackling & Evasion: Players must anticipate and react to incoming tackles. A directional dodge mechanic allows players to evade defenders.
Stiff Arm/Hurdle: A contextual button press allows the player to either push away a defender with a stiff arm or leap over a tackle (hurdle).
Blocking System (AI Teammates): Teammates will intelligently attempt to block defenders, creating openings for the ball carrier.
player_abilities: Sprint: A temporary burst of speed, allowing the player to outrun defenders.
Spin Move: A quick spin that can disorient and break the tackle of a single defender.
Juke Move: A sharp, directional cut that can be used to fake out defenders and change direction quickly.

enemies.name: Cornerback
enemies.behavior: Patrols wider areas, attempts to tackle by cutting off angles. Becomes more aggressive as speed increases.

enemies.name: Linebacker
enemies.behavior: More direct pursuer, attempts tackles head-on. Uses a 'charge' mechanic to close distance.

enemies.name: Safety
enemies.behavior: Roams deeper, attempts to intercept or make last-ditch tackles. Can have a 'blitz' ability to rush the player.

powerups.name: Momentum Surge
powerups.effect: Temporarily increases player speed and makes them harder to tackle.

powerups.name: Teammate Blitz
powerups.effect: Causes all AI teammates to aggressively block for a short duration.

powerups.name: Tackle Immunity
powerups.effect: Makes the player temporarily immune to tackles.

concept.level_progression: Levels represent different offensive plays or scenarios. Each level increases the number, aggression, and tactical positioning of defenders. Special 'boss' levels could feature elite defensive formations or unique enemy types.
concept.scoring_system: Scoring is primarily achieved by successfully reaching the end zone for a touchdown (6 points).  Additional points can be awarded for breaking multiple tackles on a single run, completing long runs, or scoring on difficult plays.  A multiplier system could be implemented for consecutive successful runs or touchdowns.
concept.visual_style: Bright, pixel-art style with exaggerated character animations. The field should be vibrant green, with clear lines and distinct goal posts. Defenders have distinct color palettes and silhouette shapes to easily identify their roles.
concept.sound_theme: Upbeat, energetic chiptune music that ramps up intensity during challenging moments. Sound effects are punchy and satisfying, with distinct audio cues for tackles, dodges, powerups, and the roar of the crowd.

level_design.name: Opening Drive
level_design.description: Your first drive of the game. Learn the basics of ball carrying, evading defenders, and utilizing your teammates' blocks. The goal is to advance down the field and score.

objectives.description: Advance the ball to the opposing end zone.
